justification: The proposal misreads Team B: they value dual-threat QBs yet would be giving up their only healthy one (James Jones) for a Tier 4 pocket passer. It even mislabels B’s outgoing QB as a pocket passer. Little evidence of B’s urgency, injury aversion, or roster needs (Logan Clark is out; TE room hurt). The trade is mechanically feasible, but the rationale is generic and inaccurate, and p_accept seems optimistic given B’s preferences. Limited ToM shown.
